featured.text: The researchers collected more than 500 yellow-bellied sea snakes and weighed them.
Because yellow-bellied sea snakes usually spend all of their time far from land, rain is the animals’ only source of fresh water.
An international team of researchers focused on a population of yellow-bellied sea snakes living near Costa Rica, where rain often does not fall for up to seven months out of the year.

definition.zh_def: 腹部，尤其是指肚子或胃部。
definition.en_def: The front part of the body between the chest and the hips; the stomach.
definition.example: He felt a rumble in his belly after skipping breakfast.
